channel.title: Developement teams
channel.description: What happened to moderators having to approve the post? It seems like so many pop up all the time, then die down because of some lazy owner who didn't feel like finishing his barely edited PI base. I think the whole "mod approval" should return, along with the fact that you have to post that picture of mod approve. Atleast you'll get some dedicated people.

item.title: Developement teams
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

krackkid:

The mod didn’t work with the new smf I think.

Well just go with pming and the picture. If you don’t have it, then a mod just removes the topic.

Read full topic
